briefTitle: " Role of Diffusion Weighted Image in the Diagnosis and Follow up of Breast Cancer"
officialTitle: " Role of Diffusion Weighted Image in the Diagnosis and Follow up of Breast Cancer"
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Rate of correlated false positive results of MRI DWI for the lesion with the positive results by histopathology.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* \* Female gender

  * Age more than 18 years
  * Patients presented with breast lump
  * Patients with recurrent breast cancer following chemotherapy or radiotherapy sessions.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Male gender

  * Age younger than 18 years
  * Patients with recent breast trauma in the same diseased breast within the last 6 months
  * Lactating female presented with acute symptoms as trauma or breast abscess
  * Contraindication to perform MRI examination .these include : Cardiac pacemaker -Metallic aneurysm clips
